Is the Trumpeter Swan the largest bird?	It is the largest bird of North America.

Where is the word "swan" derived from?	Old English swan.
Where is the word "swan" derived from?	The Old English word "swan," derived from the Indo-European root "*swen", meaning to sound or to sing

What is the name of an adult female?	Pen.
What is the name of an adult female?	An adult female swan is called a pen.
What is the color of the Australian Black Swan?	Completely black except for the white flight feathers on its wings.
